text: Mugihe mwari k’uruhande rw’umwaba wari hafi yanyu, nabo bari k’urundi ruhande rw’umwaba uri kure n’abari murugendo wari munsi yanyu, rero iyo mwari guhana isango mwari gucanamwo mugabo kugira ngo Imana itange ijambo ryari kuba ngombwa ngo rishirwe mungiro nukubera yuko uwuhonywa ahonywa afise ivyemezo biri k’umugaragaro, n’uwukurikira idini rya Isilamu narikurikire afise ivyemezo biri k’umugaragaro, mu vy’ukuri Imana niyo yumva kandi niyo nyene ubumenyi buhagije
